name: Mars Cave Explorer
description:
Explore the deepest caves of Mars. Use your thrusters to navigate the caves of Mars and collect gems. Return the gems back to base and exchange them for credits. These credits can be used to buy upgrades for your ship allowing you to delve deeper into the caves. Returning to base also repairs and recharges your ship for free!

Best played with a gamepad.

[a]/[d] or (lt)/(rt) to fire thrusters.

[s] or (A) to active/deactivate tractor beam.

[1]/[2]/[3] or (X)/(Y)/(B) to buy upgrades.

[esc] or (start) to self destruct if you run out of power or get stuck.

[enter] or (start) to start a new game after your ship is destroyed.

[tab] or (select) flip the direction the thruster controls.
